TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListBox/SelectedObjectCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type ListBox.SelectedObjectCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示 中选定项的集合。

span.span: Represents the collection of selected items in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类存储中的选定的项。The class stores the selected items in the . 项目存储在项包含在类。The items stored in the are items contained within the class. 类存储中显示的所有项目。The class stores all items displayed in the . 下表是举例说明如何中存储的项示例中其所选内容状态以及。The following table is an example of how the stores the items of the as well as their selection states within an example . |索引Index|项Item|在列表框内选择状态Selection state within the ListBox| |-----------|----------|----------------------------------------| |00|object1object1|未选定Unselected| |11|object2object2|已选定Selected| |22|object3object3|未选定Unselected| |33|object4object4|已选定Selected| |44|object5object5|已选定Selected| 基于上表中所示下, 表说明了如何将会显示。Based on the demonstrated in the previous table, the following table demonstrates how the would appear. |索引Index|ObjectCollection 中选定的项Selected item from ObjectCollection| |-----------|-----------------------------------------| |00|object2object2| |11|object4object4| |22|object5object5| 可以使用的属性和此类的方法来执行各种任务的集合。You can use the properties and methods of this class to perform a variety of tasks with the collection. 方法使您能够确定的某个项是否类是的成员。The method enables you to determine whether an item from the class is a member of the . 一旦您知道项位于集合内，就可以使用方法，以确定其中中的特定项有关存储在。Once you know that the item is located within the collection, you can use the method to determine where a specific item within the for the is stored within the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使您能够确定的某个项是否类是存储中的选定项的成员。The method enables you to determine whether an item from the class is a member of the selected items stored in the . 可以使用这可确定是否中多选的特定项处于选中状态。You can use this to determine if a specific item in a multiple-selection is selected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于合并多个集合合并为一个数组中的选定的项。You can use this method to combine the selected items from multiple collections into a single array.

summary.span: 获取集合中的项数。

span.span: Gets the number of items in the collection.
The number of items in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可确定中选定项的数量。This property enables you to determine the number of selected items in the . 遍历集合的值时，然后可以使用此值，需要提供要执行循环的迭代次数。You can then use this value when looping through the values of the collection and you need to provide a number of iterations to perform the loop. 除非的属性设置为`SelectionMode.MultiSimple`或`SelectionMode.MultiExtended`，此属性始终返回零 (0) 或一 （1） 具体取决于您是否有选定的项的值。Unless the property of the is set to `SelectionMode.MultiSimple` or `SelectionMode.MultiExtended`, this property always returns a value of zero (0) or one (1) depending on whether you have a selected item.
